Shiny is an applications framework written in R for creating interactive user interfaces. Members of the Department have created Shiny apps to make complex statistical procedures more accessible.

## Complete listing of Department Shiny applications

#### snSMART Sample Size App

Small n Sequential, Multiple Assignment, Randomized Trial (snSMART) is a two-stage clinical trial design for rare diseases. [Use the app](https://umich-biostatistics.shinyapps.io/snsmart_sample_size_app/).
